name: Foundjutsu
description:
Hobby project during the 2021 lockdowns

Features
  • Spell combination
    • 5 base spells and 23 combination spell
  • "Working" online multiplayer
    • I'm happy with it - just not AAA grade
  • Boss fight
  • Semi-random level generation
  • 2 playable characters
  • Built with Godot
Instructions
  • Number keys to select spell and add to the combination
  • Mouse click or arrow keys to release spell
  • Multiplayer
    • Host player goes to the lobby and starts hosting
    • Host must have port 29604 forwarded to play over the internet
    • Other players (up to 3) join using the host's IP

Credits
  • Game-icons.net - skill icons
  • Heartbeast - 2D RPG patterns/examples
  • Game Endeavor - AI steering behavior inspiration
  • Game Development Center - Multiplayer inspiration
